text.text_translated: Cape Town can be a dangerous place for baboons. Cars hurt or kill some baboons. Others play with electric cables. The cables can kill them. Baboons are an endangered type of animal. This shows there are not many of these animals left. People want to save them. They also want to make problems between baboons and people smaller. So, the city leaders give jobs to a team of Baboon Monitors. These monitors make baboons leave city areas. Or they catch them and let them go in the countryside. This plan helps a little. But it is hard to stop baboons from coming back to the city. They come back because they find easy food there.

best_attempt.text_translated: Cape Town can be a dangerous place for baboons. Cars hurt or kill some baboons. Others play with electric cables. The cables can kill them. Baboons are an endangered species. This means there are not many of these animals left. People want to save them. They also want to make problems between baboons and people smaller. So, the city council gives jobs to a team of Baboon Monitors. These monitors make baboons leave city areas. Or they catch them and let them go in the countryside. This plan helps a little. But it is hard to stop baboons from coming back to the city. They come back because they find easy food there.
